certificate.custodyDesc: This asset is stored with a licensed third-party custodian. The platform never holds the physical asset directly.
certificate.legalDesc: Each fraction NFT represents a legally binding ownership stake. You are not just buying an image — you hold real rights.
certificate.revenueShare: Revenue sharing upon asset sale or liquidation
certificate.legalNotice: Your rights are encoded in the smart contract and backed by the platform's Terms of Service. In the event of asset liquidation, proceeds are distributed proportionally to all fraction holders.
certificate.chainDesc: Every fraction is a verifiable token on the blockchain. Ownership is transparent, immutable, and auditable by anyone.
certificate.walletDesc: Your fractions are stored in your own Account Abstraction wallet. Even if this platform shuts down, your assets remain safe on-chain.
certificate.guarantee1: Your assets exist on-chain — not on our servers
certificate.guarantee2: Platform shutdown does not affect your ownership
certificate.guarantee3: You can transfer or sell fractions independently via any ERC-1155 compatible wallet
certificate.footerNote: This certificate is generated from on-chain data and third-party custody records. All information is verifiable on the Base blockchain.
certificate.copyrightDesc: This music asset is registered with an official copyright association. Royalty rights are legally protected.
certificate.aiDisclosureDesc: Full transparency on how this music was produced — AI tools used and human contributions involved.
certificate.aiNotice: This track uses AI-assisted composition. A human performer and registrant are required for official copyright registration (e.g. KOMCA). All AI usage is fully disclosed.
certificate.streamingDesc: Fraction holders receive proportional streaming royalties from registered platforms.
